snippet: Word of the loans comes after the Chinese economy slowed somewhat over the summer, although it is still expanding faster than most countries worldwide.
lead_paragraph: Word of the loans comes after the Chinese economy slowed somewhat over the summer, although it is still expanding faster than most countries worldwide.

headline.main: China Central Bank Appears to Inject $81 Billion Into Top Lenders
headline.print_headline: China Central Bank Appears to Inject $81 Billion Into Top Lenders
